thread.section_title: ProBikeKit (Australia) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ProBikeKit (Australia) | probikekit.com.au
thread.title: Stephen

author: Stephen
title: Stephen
text: I typically know what I require so; I am buying on price and availability, however I most often check out clearance items and specials if time permits. I have indulged upon the occasional impulse purchase and spent more than I originally planned with PBK and I am happy to report I have never been disappointed with my purchases. Very quick delivery in most if not all cases and excellent communication with eta's. I have also made inquiries about certain products and received good advice in a very timely manor. I am a happy customer. Thank you.
